channel.title: ADDing commands to a "Case:"
channel.description:
sorry for reposting but nobody is listening to me
Does anyone know how to make a Case give members out to people or connect the item to a command?

item.title: ADDing commands to a "Case:"
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

I didnt know you have to add “}” in a case… thats for that i only have 1 error now

client.java:3194:cannot find symbol symbol :variable command location:class client String member = commands.substring<11>;

Do i need to add “substring<11>”? to PlayerHandler?

Read full topic

item.title: ADDing commands to a "Case:"
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

try this

[code]
case 5473://member object
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100)) {
String member = command.substring(11);
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” has become a Member!”);

	for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
		if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
			if(PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(member)){
				PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
				disconnected = true;
			} else {
				sendMessage("PAY UP MATE");
			}
		}
	}
}

break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ADDing commands to a "Case:"
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

I would prefer if i could do it directly

I know this has errors i just cant get the case to only work if you have 100gp or more…

where do i put the >

[code]
case 5473://member object

if(playerHasItemAmount (995 100))
String member = command.substring(11);
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” has become a Member!”);

for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
if(PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(member)){
PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
disconnected = true;
else if(playerHasItemAmount (995 100))
sendMessage(“PAY UP MATE”);
break;[/code]

When i am finished they will pay more

SORRY!!!
I missed out a lot of ;

Read full topic
